## Gang.nextCycle() method

Sleeps until the start of the next Gang cycle.

**Signature:**

```typescript
nextCycle(): Promise<number>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;number&gt;

{<!-- -->Promise<number>} Resolves to the number of gang cycles ready to be processed, which can vary due to "bonus time".

## Remarks

RAM cost: 1 GB
